item.title: Everything You Need to be Faster on Track - The Driver's University
item.description: Driving technique tutorials for sim, track day and racing drivers to make you faster, safer and more consistent on track. The driving technique lessons are written and presented by professional driver and coach Scott Mansell.

item.title: CWT x Quantopian: Workflow of professional quant traders
Quantitative Finance
item.description: All the videos I've made related to quantitative finance. Most are based on the book "Paul Wilmott on Quantitative Finance, 2nd Edition". Some are from "The Concepts and Practice of Mathematical Finance" by Mark Joshi.

item.title: MINI LECTURES IN PROBABILITY
item.description: Going through the core of probabilistic concepts without the BS, focusing on the intuition. Many use canned statistical metrics without knowing what they mean, hence make huge mistakes in interpretations and applications.

item.title: Python: Making a Discord Bot (Rewrite / v1.x)
item.description: In this series, we make a discord bot in python using discord.py version 1.0 also known as the rewrite branch of discord.py.
